snippet: A prosecutor said former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi of Italy knew that a woman, Karima el-Mahrouga, was underage when he had sex with her.
abstract: Prosecutors conclude case against former Italian Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi, who has been accused of paying for sex with an under-age prostitute and then abusing his powers to cover it; call for a six-year jail sentence and a lifetime ban from public office; court is expected to announce verdict in June.
lead_paragraph: A prosecutor said former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi of Italy knew that a woman, Karima el-Mahrouga, was underage when he had sex with her.

headline.seo: Prosecution Rests in Sex Case Against Berlusconi
headline.main: Prosecution Rests in Sex Case Against Berlusconi
